about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Infollion Research Services is a B2B marketplace. They are operating in the B2B Human Cloud segment, catering to on-demand contingent hiring of subject matter experts. They provide a platform for workers or knowledge providers (gig workers) and employers or knowledge seekers to connect with each other.

Key clients include top-tier Global Management Consulting firms, renowned Private Equity funds, Hedge funds, and mid-tier Corporates.

They operate in the premium segment of the gig-economy and are one of the leading enablers of contingent hiring, temporary workforce management, contracting SOW-employees, high-level independent consultations, knowledge tours, and more.

Their direct competitors are other expert networks and freelancing platforms, while indirectly they compete with staffing firms.

faqs.question: What is the Infollion Research Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Infollion Research Services IPO is a SME IPO of 2616000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹21.45 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹82 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on May 29, 2023, and closes on May 31, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Infollion Research Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Infollion Research Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Infollion Research Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Infollion Research Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Infollion Research Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Infollion Research Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Infollion Research Services IPO opens on May 29, 2023 and closes on May 31, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Infollion Research Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Infollion Research Services IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,31,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Infollion Research Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Infollion Research Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Infollion Research Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Infollion Research Services IPO will be done on Monday, June 5, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, June 7, 2023. Check the Infollion Research Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Infollion Research Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Infollion Research Services IPO listing date is on Thursday, June 8, 2023.
